q.quote: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.
q.author: St. Jerome

q.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
q.author: Helen Keller

q.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
q.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

q.quote: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
q.author: Buddha

q.quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
q.author: Benjamin Franklin

q.quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
q.author: Og Mandino

q.quote: Heavy hearts, like heavy clouds in the sky, are best relieved by the letting of a little water.
q.author: Christopher Morley

q.quote: Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It's the best part of the day.
q.author: George Allen, Sr.

q.quote: My life motto is 'Do my best, so that I can't blame myself for anything.'
q.author: Magdalena Neuner

q.quote: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.
q.author: Joyce Brothers

q.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
q.author: Mahatma Gandhi

q.quote: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.
q.author: Henry Ford

q.quote: The best thing one can do when it's raining is to let it rain.
q.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

q.quote: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it.
q.author: Richard Bach

q.quote: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
q.author: Epictetus
